page.title: 02Life in our block.
page.content: Our block lies a few miles North of Merthyr Tydfil the town of Tydfil the martyr whom it is said was murdered and buried where the town now stands The town was also famous for its iron and steel industry.Nowadays much of its heavy industry has gone and now the town depends on light industry for jobs.The main factory in the town is the Hoover washing machine factory which once gave 5000 people jobs.But now many of these jobs have been lost and there are many people out of work. Our block includes the old and new parts of Merthyr.The new is seen in the large modern housing estate of the Gurnos.The old area is the Dowlais area.Here the old ironworkers cottages are built in terraces.Some with their strange names like Alphonso Street remind us of the people who came from Spain,Ireland to work in the ironworks
